titles.title: Ending Taxpayer Support for Big Egg Producers Act
Ending Taxpayer Support for Big Egg Producers Act

A bill to amend the Animal Health Protection Act to require certain certifications from persons provided indemnification or compensation by the Secretary of Agriculture for poultry flocks affected by the highly pathogenic avian influenza, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.
